title: Can't wait to see how utterly shit Riot makes the game this season with the "Soon" excuse
body:
Every fucking balance issue from last season will be completely ignored because these fucking dimwits are just going to add even more this time which will probably make everything even worse.

And you already know they won't do anything to fix those because:

* It's preseason! It's always a mess!
* We want to see how things turn out mid-season before we touch anything...
* Sorry but Worlds is coming up, gotta play meta-maker because we only want OUR favorites being touched

Just like this fucking season, god I want a League alternative so this POS company can go under already, they're becoming just another stupid money-grubber with a whole fucking list of excuses for why they can't make their game better.

replies.body: Let's hope season 8 remains as the worst season and they won't repeat the mistakes.
Of course they aren't going to repeat the mistake, that would be bland, you know Riot is going to go beyond expectation and make even more colossal mistakes.
Sounds about right

Up until season 8, season 6 was the unanimous worst season in the game. And a big reason why isn't just dynamic queue alone, but the fact that riot actively ignored the entire community as a whole who were all collectively saying "bring back soloQ" the entire season in _every form of input_ (surveys, reddit, boards, twitch streams, pro players on twitter, their own roundtable).

And season 8 was literally the exact same "new runes are shit, too much damage in the game" feedback from literally everyone, from everywhere and they aren't listening to that even now.

I'm doubtful that hoping that things change is going to change or fix anything.
That's what I said about Season 6.
I don't think season 6 was all that bad (besides dynamic queue)

When did you start playing?  

Riot has been consistently changing the "core" draw of the game. I've noticed players who have started before Season 1 have expressed a soured experience starting Season 4-5, Players who started Season 2 have lost full interest by Season 5-6, and Players who started in Season 3-4 started hating the game around Season 6-7, etc. League is only fun to people for about 4 years. That is fairly consistent, I notice.

Season 2 player here, League is the only game I still play consistently, other games come and go but League never gets old :^)
Idk, it probably has something that has to do WITH HOW EVERY GAME RELEASED NOW IS ABSOLUTELY GARBAGE AND I HAVE TO MAKE DO WITH WHAT I HAVE, or something like that ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

You must not play an awful lot of games. There's a bunch of alternatives to league, even within the same genre. Calling every game, released nowadays, 'garbage' because you can't admit your personal league bias is a little shallow, don't you think.

Granted, league has this going for it; you can leave and come back any time, and not get punished aside from having to a learn a few new champions' kits for the most part.

My bad for generalizing. However, I think the point that most new releases are pretty garbage is valid. Might be objective opinion, but I haven't found any games that I would actually want to spend time picking up.
They won t repeat mistakes for sure, they will just make it worse. RITO is very good at it.
Well, they are already nerfing TP again so.... you won't have to wait long. {{summoner:14}}  buff incoming bc "it doesn't oneshot 5 champs yet"
Ignite spread on death.
Korean call Ignite Amaterasu. If it actually spreads, the nickname can't be more true

> [{quoted}](name=FilDaFunk,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TPaXKKw8,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-11-18T19:09:36.886+0000)
>
> Ignite spread on death.

Ignite refund some CD for each unused tick on kill.
"Bugfix : sometimes the champion targeted by ignite did not die, we fixed this".

Huh?
The game is great, just look at reddit.
KDA totally safed this game and the international spotlight is on riot as such a great company cuz of KDA.

> [{quoted}](name=GayFluffyUnicorn,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TPaXKKw8,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-11-18T19:48:07.435+0000)
>
> Huh?
> The game is great, just look at reddit.
> KDA totally safed this game and the international spotlight is on riot as such a great company cuz of KDA.

A skin line has nothing to do with the game's balance at all, i hope you are being facetious

I wish boards would up their reading comprehension game.

Why are guys like you even commenting you obviously skipped elementary school.
Considering you cant even structure a sentence properly do you really think you have a right to ask that?

This game it s just disgusting. The amount of damage is out of control. ADC role is in a shitty  state right now, you can get deleted even by a fucking tank or support. Juggernauts/bruisers are literally tanks with assassin's burst. Cut the damn snowball it s getting crazy.Late game doesn t even exist anymore, it s all about early game. As ADC you have shitty life early game and if you make it to the late game ever.. it s the same thing, still shitty life, getting erased by pretty much everyone.

Even when you have an advantage as an ADC there s one bruiser,mage or anything else  much more behind you and is able to destroy you. This game is not enjoyable at all, it s all about cc, mobility and tankiness. The balance team is made of braindead people I wouldn t even hire to Mc Donald's cause they re fking incompetents and ignorant they don t even play their own game, otherwise I can t explain.
They  even want to add more damage to tanks. I feel like roles they lost their identity. You don t know anymore who s assassin or who s suppossed to be tanky or damage carry because the burst of damage is everywhere. Can you just allow tanks to only be tanks, fighters just fighters, carries being actually carries and assassins just assassins instead of making league of tank-assassins????
Damn not even preseason and people are already saying the game has been ruined again

Riot: *wants to think carefully of how to nerf champions without destroying their game*

People on boards with big mouths that don't realize pretty much only people that agree with them click on their posts and not to mention people who only want to listen to their own ideas and be enveloped in their own riot sucks bubble: "let's just yell at riot without any real goal in mind, and even if we do have a goal in mind, which is rare because we can't think for ourselves, let's give no helpful criticism and just be vulgar."

As someone who has played League since it's been out, I've seen guys like you on the boards throughout it's entire life. Even before the boards, back when they just had the forums, you pests still existed. You all want to complain about how bad the game is instead of just finding a game you like. It's pretty sad. You don't even give good advice, you just yell at riot. You guys will never die out, you guys will never get anything done, but yet you still continue on like a tumor in riot's brain. There's some of you in every type of competitive game. None of you even know how to think outside of the box and it's almost like you complain without thinking. It's sad really. It's like watching animals... No animals are a bit smarter than that... It's like watching bugs, little ants, crawl all over the boards to form their colony of flame riot games. Gross. Still better than the way people hate on WoW though imo. If you guys wanna see some real idiots, check out their forums. I'll try my hardest to ignore you cancerous boards posters, but you're malignant. You just want to destroy. You have no real solution in mind, you don't want to fix anything. You just want riot to hurt the same way you did when that tank Viktor top won against you in a 1v1. You just want everyone on the skins team, all those wonderful people who made your favorite skins, to lose their jobs. Why? Because you don't like how Riven can animation cancel. You just want the music team on riot to not be able to afford rent anymore, even though they get so much praise, because you think Teemo is annoying.


To all of you who actually agree with this man, but offered actual advice to riot, or at least a helpful opinion. Go you. You're the type of people who can actually help improve a game. There's plenty of things I dislike in League of Legends, but complaining about them the right way is step 1 to getting that problem fixed.

Long post nothing said, no substance. 
Typical riot shill. 

Riot is destroying their own game by not doing anything. 
Kinda ironic you talk about viktor top who is destroying the game but we just got used to toplane being less played and less relevant than support so who cares. You are a support lulu main ofc you like the game. You never had more agency. You decide botlane, you make one enemy completely useless and win the game off of pressing polymorph and ult. And it's always the same players who find this game so great: support mains. 
It is always support players why wouldn't they like the game. you don't have to deal with an entire lane being neglected in balance being destroy every month by some other champ that just destroys everything and you don't get to play your favorite champions always being excused with "well theoretically you have a jungler so it's balanced xd". 

People like me do exist in every competitive game yes. Passionate tryhards that have seen too many of their favorite games being destroyed by greed or sheer incompetence and don't want to see the same thing happening again
The entirety of season 8 was preseason lmao

Various opinions exist of the state of the game sadly 

A good example is a recent podcast of scarra voyboy and imaqtpie with imaqtpie showing extreme hatred of the direction of the game while voyboy expressing it being some of the best league he has played.

Personally I feel the game is pretty good with a few champs a bit overtuned.
Can you link that here?

> [{quoted}](name=Automated Riven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TPaXKKw8,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2018-11-18T21:32:07.972+0000)
>
> Can you link that here?

https://youtu.be/DTwsn91oluY

It's a really interesting listen

Even if clearly some people are enjoying the game, does this mean Riot should continue to push in that direction? I mean, if we are using base game designing logic, it should be the majority of the community's feedback who should define what the game designer should do to get positive feedback in return. Sadly, I don't think the "League of Legends in Season 8 is good" party is the most popular one however, quite the opposite I believe.

> [{quoted}](name=ThePaffLegacy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TPaXKKw8,comment-id=000c0001,timestamp=2018-11-19T07:32:22.229+0000)
>
> Even if clearly some people are enjoying the game, does this mean Riot should continue to push in that direction? I mean, if we are using base game designing logic, it should be the majority of the community's feedback who should define what the game designer should do to get positive feedback in return. Sadly, I don't think the "League of Legends in Season 8 is good" party is the most popular one however, quite the opposite I believe.

But how do you know that the vast majority of people don't enjoy league ? The game is absolutely massive and people pour endless amounts of time into it . If the game truly was bad people would not play it.

You cant judge community opinion off of this forum or even reddit as people come to these sites 9 times out of 10 to complain that is human nature we rarely praise.

What if the majority of people have my perspective of the game that overall the game is in an ok place with a few tweaks needed , the silent majority you might call it. 

I personally come on this board and try to put my perspective because I am so tired of seeing the circle jerk rage against riot meme that has become this board it has to stop we need to grow up.

Why is it that this thread which is basically just toxic hate spew get a fuck ton of upvotes, every comment that agrees with it get upvotes, and every comment that actually has something rational to say gets downvoted? Sure Riot fucks up lol, but I feel like the community (part of it anyway) is more of a problem than a lot of the self entitled pricks in it like to think. Because how could they be at fault right :    ^)

Well, because maybe, just maybe, the "entitled pricks" actually have a POINT?!

Given with how Riot has been actively not giving a fuck, we have long passed the point where we should bother with rational arguments. Damage too high, runes are garbage, everything that could have been said has already been said and done and debated in a constructive fashion, and Riot simply does not give a shit. When everything has been said, there is no point to repeat it again and again if the other party is not listening - might as well kick them in the nuts collectively, might work better.

They probably don't care about the boards because most of the people here are just here to complain where as the people who are fine with game just don't come here at all. I just come here to read your guys complaints.

> They probably don't care about the boards because most of the people here are just here to complain 

In game designing, ignoring the community's feedback solely because its negative is just like if a restaurant put rat poison on every dishes and ignore if people are getting sick from it because "its their fault"

> [{quoted}](name=ThatShinyPiplup,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TPaXKKw8,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2018-11-18T21:53:16.483+0000)
>
> Why is it that this thread which is basically just toxic hate spew get a fuck ton of upvotes, every comment that agrees with it get upvotes, and every comment that actually has something rational to say gets downvoted? Sure Riot fucks up lol, but I feel like the community (part of it anyway) is more of a problem than a lot of the self entitled pricks in it like to think. Because how could they be at fault right :    ^)

Who has the power to change the game to their liking? Community or Riot?
Its been over 3 goddam years now that Riot ignores the community's feedback and makes the game worst and worst each season. If this is not enought to make people angry, I don't know what will.

naaah fam they gun fix it soooooon x)

broken marriages because of this game? gun fix it soooooon too! x)
dun ya worry pal, we'll give you some fake sense of safety in the meantime fammm
dun worry, they fixin it soooooooooooooooooooooooooon x)

oh wait first they gotta make a few skins, but i promise fam, they gun do it soooooooon! x)

> [{quoted}](name=TechSupportLoL,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TPaXKKw8,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-18T15:04:14.046+0000)
> god I want a League alternative

DotA 2, HotS...?

PreSeason 8: Damage is a little too high Riot, tone it down a bit?
*Riot* Lets buff tanks damage because they cant keep up.

Season 8 beginning: Riot literally everyone is one shotting each other, even the 0 damage item tanks are one shotting. Rengar hops out of a brush and you die instantly!
*Riot* Ok lets nerf tanks into the ground to where theyre now just bruiser champs that still one shot.

Mid Season: Hey Riot, Assassins are one shotting everyone once they take a breath of air next to me, and adcs are 3 autoing me. Please fix?
*Riot* Lets nerf tp because thats what the players want

End Season: Ok Riot seriously, people shouldnt be starting the game lvl 1 with 86 starting ad or 40 AP. Fix your god damn game already, people should never be bursting this hard ever. CS rarely even matters now, impact isnt there, games are more coin flipped than ever, please just nerf damage!
*Riot* Ok lets introduce new dark harvest that gives you bonus damage on your ability when damaging an enemy under 50% health.

ive got to say this is what they wanted, when they brought out all their new runes and items etc. they asked if we could all try to break the game, now this has been successful in my opinion, we have seen a range of champs and strats come thru the meta this year.
yes a lot of things were rather frustrating at any level of play but I think as players we have gotten better at recognising what is and isn't okay in the game. I enjoyed my year but also really hated it :)
They don't listen to their community whatsoever? What are you even talking about?

> [{quoted}](name=charge attack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TPaXKKw8,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-11-18T18:33:07.980+0000)

> 
> “Why do junglers get to free farm without interaction with their opponents” - scuttle changes
> 
> Except every time they listened more people came that were angry at objectively shit changes only made to appease trash on boards. Lmao. They realized they should balance around pro players cause they actually have more than 2 brain cells. 
> 
> Ofc people on boards have short term memory loss too. Downvote away. Doesn’t make all of you any less stupid. Lata.

Except changes made for balancing pro suck for 90+% of the player base who suddenly aren't allowed to play {{champion:113}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:98}} even {{champion:84}} without being trolling bc you picked a 40% winrate champ into a 60% wr {{champion:39}}, {{champion:104}} or {{champion:24}}  and just forfeit the game for your team. Oh and you can't take {{summoner:12}} bc moving moving across the map after 7s on a 6 min cooldown is too op but doing 50% max hp with {{summoner:14}} is balanced /s (hyperbole btw)

> [{quoted}](name=Minimac2000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TPaXKKw8,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-18T18:54:02.752+0000)
>

Oh and you can't take {{summoner:12}} bc moving moving across the map after 7s on a 6 min cooldown is too op but doing 50% max hp with {{summoner:14}} is balanced /s (hyperbole btw)

You forgot my boy {{champion:154}} . Jungle only supports with 'BiG LC$ PLayZ All DaY' blow all the dicks in solo queue. 46% in the jg and 15% in lane is so much better than the 50% in both pre rework. Fucking incompetence.

yes. i dont understand zac changes and riot keeping him same way now. He is trash on top - without jg help unplayable and now for a long period of time garbage in jg. I think he¨s like the 2nd worst jg right now. Here goes my main champion i guess. I just hope they will revert his changes.
can you elaborate on why he has such a problem in both roles?  I liked zac's concept, but i'm not very familiar with him as a champion

Before rework he was rly fun to play on top. His Q had poke and you could build him AP/Tank or hybrid. He was a very fun to play fighter. You cant rly do that now. You have to go for full tank build because your Q doesnt go through the minion wave and for dmg and cc you have to connect it with another target. You have less dmg, no poke, youre not tanky as other top tanks are. Also they nerfed his W dmg and range so you cant rly trade. Especially against something ranged or like camille. You are full tank with no much of a dmg so youre just a cc bot for your team and it gets boring. Zac is on the other hand good when your jg helps you but he has to babysit you - good for duoQ maybe..low elo. Then you can be useful. 
And jg- he cant rly 1v1 enemy jg cause (as mentioned earlier) he hasnt got dmg. In crab meta when its all about contesting those green thingis ... not rly good champion. His clear is fine tho, but hes very weak early and enemy jg can invade you whenever he want and you cant do anything about it. His winrate also dropped on 45% i think. I still play him on top mostly now, cause i dont want to learn best jg pathing-takes so much time. I guess you can do this on my rank (silver) but even there its bad and i have to try really hard to do something :D Most of solo kills come from enemies mistakes or outplaying dives (with passive lol)
Also old R was much more fun than new one. New one can be gamechanger, but also a game destroyer. Its a good ability but does anyone rly enjoy it? Maybe first succesful ultimates when you lock whole enemy team but then you realize youre still a cc bot. You can play leona instead and be more usefull to the team. But the old R? Who wouldnt bounce around rift and take kills?  It wwas like best ultimate in whole gam for me and thats why i started to main the blobber.

it's an odd thing to think, but have you considered taking him mid?

if his matchups are bad top for those reasons, perhaps he should use his durability  and sustain to his advantage in another lane

with lots of crowd control and decent burst, if you can solve the wave-clear problem, he'd be a decent match against a lot of the mid meta

I tried to google zac mid but all i found was some guide on mobafire :D But it could work against something, i wouldnt go for blind first pick tho :D I dont know if this could work. Especially in low elo where i belong, where meta doesnt rly exist so you can get anything on mid against you. And i think that ranged mage mid will destroy him.. i dont know tho. And assasins usually have dashes so they will probably escape from your ulti.. dont know. I may try it.
